entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:44 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
